base_description: White spherical globe with a stand.
part_description: The globe has a spherical body, a semi-circular arm, and a round base. The arm holds the globe and connects to the base.
internal_interaction_description: The semi-circular arm supports the spherical globe, allowing it to rotate. The arm is attached to the base, providing stability and enabling the globe to spin on its axis smoothly.
external_interaction_description: The globe can be manually rotated by a person to view different areas. It serves as an educational tool for learning geography and can be placed on desks or tables as a decorative item.
